cont.entity_b: Comparable to high settings on other models.

cont.entity_a: Loud operation, likened to a small plane. Excessively noisy, even on the lowest setting. Too loud for domestic use, particularly in bedrooms or studies. Very noisy but effective for white noise.
cont.entity_b: Poor craftsmanship with loose blades and excessive noise. Powerful air circulation and white noise, but not suitable for quiet environments. Loud and made of cheap plastic.

cont.entity_a: Build quality is good with a deep frame. Surviving drops and allowing for easy maintenance. Stable and moves more air than standard fans. Powerful, sturdy, and well-built.
cont.entity_b: Lasko Cyclone fan is of much higher quality. Durable and long-lasting, with good air flow and noise levels. Lightweight and easy to move, but has quality issues.

cont.entity_a: Specifications did not match the advertised features, including cord length and outlets. Does not include additional plug-ins as advertised. Blades are not as advertised, reducing air flow.
cont.entity_b: Fan arrived non-functional, but Lasko provided good customer service. Fan is powerful and adjustable but has a loose control knob. Lacks remote control.

cont.entity_a: Power cord placement under the handle is impractical and difficult to remove. Fan arrived with defects such as a misaligned cover and dented frame. Not safe for children as the protective cage broke quickly.
cont.entity_b: Fan arrived used and damaged, with poor quality control. Made of cheap materials.
Effective air circulation with strong white noise.
